lines: After graduating from Rice, I embarked on a service year program with Americorps.
I was assigned to the seventh grade of an under-resourced middle school in Eastside San Jose.
During the school day, I assisted teachers in class and ran math tutoring sessions.
After school, my coworker and I supervised a group of approximately 20 students.
I most enjoyed the after school time.
My coworker and I would help with homework and run educational activities until 6 PM each day.
During break time, I bonded with my students by joining their pick-up soccer games.
While challenging, the year was extremely rewarding.
I helped many students build confidence inside and outside of the classroom.
I will never forget my time with City Year.
